reviewText: (VHS Video) If you're in charge of training for your organization, the following ideas will help motivate your people to take advantage of the value and convenience of video training.  Master the 3 C's and move ahead with your life:  confidence, composure and competence.  In this Volume edition you learn ways to avoid making mental mistakes and getting crossed wires, how to get yourself unstuck when you're caught in attitudinal ruts, surefire ways to increase your peace of mind, productive procrastination, the best ways to overcome feeling victimized, and much more.
